Package persons

Interface IPerson

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnotherPerson, OneMorePerson, Person, SimplePerson, SmallCodePerson
    public interface IPerson
    An interface for representing persons. A person gives access to her first and last names, and to her age at any given date.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getAge​(java.util.GregorianCalendar date)
      Return this person's age at a given date, in years.
      java.lang.String getFirstName()
      Return this person's first (given) name.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return this person's last name.
      boolean wasBorn​(java.util.GregorianCalendar date)
      Decides whether this person was born at a given date.

    • Method Detail

      • getFirstName

        java.lang.String getFirstName()
        Return this person's first (given) name.
        Returns:
        this person's first (given) name.

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Return this person's last name.
        Returns:
        this person's last name.

      • wasBorn

        boolean wasBorn​(java.util.GregorianCalendar date)
        Decides whether this person was born at a given date. The person is considered to be born on her birthdate.
        Parameters:
        date - A date
        Returns:
        true if this person was born at the given date, false otherwise

      • getAge

        int getAge​(java.util.GregorianCalendar date)
        Return this person's age at a given date, in years. The birthday is included in the new year, so that, e.g., a person born 2000-10-17 is considered to be 12 years old on 2012-10-17. A person is considered to be 0 years old from the day she is born on to the day before her first birthday. The person must be born at the given date, as decided by method wasBorn(java.util.GregorianCalendar).
        Parameters:
        date - The date when the age must be evaluated
        Returns:
        this person's age at a given date, in years
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the person was not born at the given date
